div.p: This is the base Capability Statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the full set of functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own Capability Statements from

tr.td: All the functionality defined in FHIR

description.value: This is the Capability Statement to declare that the server supports SMART-on-FHIR. See the SMART-on-FHIR docs for the extension that would go with such a server
